header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, inviting, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements

yeah be spontaneous or

like I had no plans to be in that position by the time I was twenty-five like
